definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † I. [[כָּרָה]] verb. Dig (NH id.; Aram [[כְּרָא]], Eth. karaya: Ar. kara0 (c. w and esp. y Dozy:ii. 461); Syr. kro0 is be short, cut off (i.e. rounded off ?), Ar. kurah;un ball; Targum. [[כְּרֵי]] heap Dalm:Gr. 109; Syr. karyoo0 Mish. [[כרי]] id.; As. karê large vessels for holding corn, etc., Dl:HWB 353, cf. kirû (dub.) Wkl:Tel Am. Vocab.; Ba:ZMG 1887, 615 conjectures be round as orig √ mng., and comp. Ar. kariyati, 0ls=a0qu the leg is round);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[כָּרָה]] 2Ch 16:14, Ps 7:16; 2 ms. [[כָּרִיתָ]] Ps 40:7; 1 s. [[בָּרִיתִי]] Ge 50:5; 3 pl. [[כָּרוּ]] Je 18:20 + 3 t.; sf [[כָּרוּהָ]] Nu 21:18; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִכְרֶה]] Ex 21:33; 3 mpl. [[וַיִּכְרוּ]] Ge 26:25; Pt. [[כּׂרֶה]] Pr 16:27, Pr 26:27; —dig a grave, [[קֶבֶר]] Ge 50:5 (J), cf. 2Ch 16:14; a well, [[בְּאֵר]] Ge 26:25 (J), Nu 21:18 (song in JE); a pit, [[בּוֹר]] Ex 21:33; fig. of plotting against others Ps 7:16; so sq. [[שׁוּחָה]] Je 18:20, Je 18:22, sq. [[שִׁיחָה]] Ps 57:7, Ps 119:85; sq. [[שַׁחַת]] Pr 26:27; hence [[כּׂרֶה רָעָה]] Pr 16:27 one digging a calamity; [[לִי]] ´[[אָזְנַיִם כ]] Ps 40:7 ears hast thou dug  (with allusion to the cavity of the ear) for me, thou hast given me the means of hearing and obeying thy will.—On Ps 22:17 verse. II. [[כּוּר]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[עַד יִכָּרֶה שַׁהַּת]] Ps 94:13 until the pit be digged for the wicked, fig. of judgment.
